attributes.action: Keep the Olympic Stadium for athletics
attributes.additional_details:
The London 2012 Olympics are perhaps the greatest sporting occasion in the country's history.  Moreover our athletes are performing to a level beyond all expectation.  In doing so they are inspiring future generations.  DCMS should act to preserve the Olympic Stadium as a venue for those future generations.

Football does not need, nor deserve, another large, modern venue to half-fill.  Less well-heeled sports desperately do.
